links.text: You receive a good, strong handshake in return.

links.title: You: ""What's a... *boiadeiro*?""
links.text: "What's a... *boiadeiro*?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""A really cool guy.""
links.text: "A really cool guy."

links.title: Inland Empire: "It feels like there's an entire his..."
links.text: It feels like there's an entire history behind the word... but it doesn't really matter. You got it. You know what it *means*.

links.title: You: ""What kind of a cool guy exactly? I..."
links.text: "What kind of a cool guy exactly? It's not *just* a cool guy, is it?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Like me and you. Exactly so." He t..."
links.text: "Like me and you. Exactly so." He takes a swig from his flask, then offers you some.

links.title: You: "Nod knowingly."
links.text: Nod knowingly.

links.title: You: "Have a moment of silence."
links.text: Have a moment of silence.

links.title: Call Me Mañana: "He takes a swig from his flask, the..."
links.text: He takes a swig from his flask, then offers you some.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah! Let's get this party started,..."
links.text: Yeah! Let's get this party started, it's your chance to shine, boy!

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah!" (Take a swig.)"
links.text: "Oh yeah!" (Take a swig.)

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Keeps you warm on a day like this...."
links.text: "Keeps you warm on a day like this. Or any day, for that matter."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Surely a step in the right directio..."
links.text: Surely a step in the right direction -- feel that smooth texture, savour that flavour. How it flows down your gullet, like a warm caress. *That's* the sunset. By the time you arrived in this world it was already late.

links.title: You: ""Thanks, I'll pass. I'd just go wil..."
links.text: "Thanks, I'll pass. I'd just go wild."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""And then we might go wild together..."
links.text: "And then we might go wild together, which sounds fun. But I guess I have a strike to watch."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""So, anything else you wanted to di..."
links.text: "So, anything else you wanted to discuss, boiadeiro?"

links.title: You: ""I have no interest in drinking whi..."
links.text: "I have no interest in drinking while on duty."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""A man walking on the edge of a raz..."
links.text: "A man walking on the edge of a razor, eh? Leaves more for me!" He laughs and takes another sip from the flask.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The idea of alcoholic swill sloshin..."
links.text: The idea of alcoholic swill sloshing around in your bloodstream feels fairly unappealing.

links.title: You: "Leave him hanging."
links.text: Leave him hanging.

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Well, boiadeiro --" He pauses to t..."
links.text: "Well, boiadeiro --" He pauses to think a moment on the situation. "I guess I don't really have a claim to your hand or anything."

links.title: You: "No. I don't *want* to be Tequila Su..."
links.text: No. I don't *want* to be Tequila Sunset.

links.title: Inland Empire: "What's there not to want? It's got..."
links.text: What's there not to want? It's got range, meaning, layers, colours, associations, the whole works!

links.title: You: ""Name-invention feels too dangerous.""
links.text: "Name-invention feels too dangerous."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Yeah," he nods. "A name's the kind..."
links.text: "Yeah," he nods. "A name's the kind of shit that can kill a man. Mañana's a good name in that regard."

links.title: You: ""Yeah... okay, I'm totally Tequila..."
links.text: "Yeah... okay, I'm totally Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You're *Tequila Sunset*. You have b..."
links.text: You're *Tequila Sunset*. You have been Tequila Sunset for a long time now.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Your mind can only conjure up Hunk..."
links.text: Your mind can only conjure up Hunk Handy, Fucke Waldéz, Bosco... you might want to decide to keep quiet about these.

links.title: You: ""Uhhhh.... I actually don't have a..."
links.text: "Uhhhh.... I actually don't have a name."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""It can take time to come up with a..."
links.text: "It can take time to come up with a good one, for sure."

links.title: You: ""I can't do it. I'm sorry.""
links.text: "I can't do it. I'm sorry."

links.title: You: ""It's... umm... Harry.""
links.text: "It's... umm... Harry."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""I hear you and it's... uh, pleasur..."
links.text: "I hear you and it's... uh, pleasure meeting you, *Harry*." He nods. "But do keep an eye out for an alternative, alright?"

links.title: You: ""The name's done! It's Raphaël Ambr..."
links.text: "The name's done! It's Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Are you *quite* sure?""
links.text: "Are you *quite* sure?"

links.title: You: ""Of course! It's such a *cool* name..."
links.text: "Of course! It's such a *cool* name. Solemn, classy, historical... almost regal."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Hold on, man. Keep it slow and ste..."
links.text: "Hold on, man. Keep it slow and steady, don't succumb to fate. It can take time to come up with a really good one..."

links.title: You: ""Fine, perhaps I'll try again... la..."
links.text: "Fine, perhaps I'll try again... later."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""There's no rush to find yourself.""
links.text: "There's no rush to find yourself."

links.title: You: ""You can't tell a Raphaël what to d..."
links.text: "You can't tell a Raphaël what to do."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""If you say so." He shrugs and look..."
links.text: "If you say so." He shrugs and looks about at the surroundings.

links.title: You: ""Well, better than the other names..."
links.text: "Well, better than the other names I can come up with at least."

links.title: You: ""Nice talk. Gotta get moving." [Lea..."
links.text: "Nice talk. Gotta get moving." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Olá, wandering man." He looks at y..."
dialogueTree.text: "Olá, wandering man." He looks at you with soft and hazy eyes. "How can I help you?"

dialogueTree.title: Call Me Mañana: ""You a scab *now*?" The man with jo..."
dialogueTree.text: "You a scab *now*?" The man with jolly eyes winks at you.

links.title: You: ""No... I don't want to deal with th..."
links.text: "No... I don't want to deal with this again. Did you just call me a f*g?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""No-no, I said *scab*.""
links.text: "No-no, I said *scab*."

links.title: You: ""What exactly *is* a scab?""
links.text: "What exactly *is* a scab?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""A kind of a worm, content with mer..."
links.text: "A kind of a worm, content with mere survival. They come, they want to do *our job* for shittier pay, screwing over both themselves and us. Everybody loses."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, where did they all come f..."
links.text: "Hold on, where did they all come from?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Beats me. Somewhere in the ground,..."
links.text: "Beats me. Somewhere in the ground, I think."

links.title: You: ""You don't seem to like them much.""
links.text: "You don't seem to like them much."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Gotta be bloody stupid or freakin'..."
links.text: "Gotta be bloody stupid or freakin' evil to scab. Or, I guess... scared, maybe. But scared of what, of who?" He looks at the mass, squinting his eyes as if trying to ascertain what they're scared of.

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Personally, I'd rather beg than sc..."
links.text: "Personally, I'd rather beg than scab. If the gentlemen shouting on the street came *begging*, maybe they'd have gotten something."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Have you tried talking to t..."
links.text: (Nod.) "Have you tried talking to them?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""We've explained the matters, but t..."
links.text: "We've explained the matters, but they don't listen." He shakes his head. "This lot would be reasonable and go home if the big guy wasn't riling them up all the time."

links.title: Logic: "Big guy -- he means the leader of t..."
links.text: Big guy -- he means the leader of the scabs.

links.title: You: "(Shake your head.) "It's better tha..."
links.text: (Shake your head.) "It's better than begging, c'mon."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Sometimes you gotta do what you go..."
links.text: "Sometimes you gotta do what you gotta do." He nods knowingly. "But these scabs ain't begging -- they ain't holding on to their integrity."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm a scab -- poor and downt..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm a scab -- poor and downtrodden." (Wave your fist.) "Right to work!"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Good one, officer." He grins. "Don..."
links.text: "Good one, officer." He grins. "Don't worry, we here have solidarity with the RCM."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Imagine -- you cops going on a str..."
links.text: "Imagine -- you cops going on a strike, but then another cop comes in and says: 'Let us cop! For less money.'" He chuckles, then realizes:

links.title: Drama: "Psst. Show him your stolen card. No..."
links.text: Psst. Show him your stolen card. Now hast arrived the perfect moment!

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Speakin' of! What brings the RCM h..."
links.text: "Speakin' of! What brings the RCM here? To the Wild North? Come to see the strife?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not a scab. I'm a cop." (Proce..."
links.text: "I'm not a scab. I'm a cop." (Proceed.)

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Ah, I was just messing with you."..."
links.text: "Ah, I was just messing with you." His smile deepens his wrinkles even more. "No one's ever seen a cop scab."

links.title: You: "Walk away. [Leave.]"
links.text: Walk away. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Scab?" asks a man with jolly eyes,..."
dialogueTree.text: "Scab?" asks a man with jolly eyes, tilting his head.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You're hazy on the notion of a *sca..."
links.text: You're hazy on the notion of a *scab*. Smells like politics, though. Maybe it's got something to do with the flask he reaches for, from time to time?

links.title: Half Light: "What did he just call you?! A f*g?..."
links.text: What did he just call you?! A f*g? Oh no, not this again, you just got away from that fucking kid...

dialogueTree.title: Call Me Mañana: "The boiadeiro stares at you with re..."
dialogueTree.text: The boiadeiro stares at you with respect -- then gestures towards the trickles of blood adorning your clothes.

links.title: You: ""Danger comes with the boiadeiro li..."
links.text: "Danger comes with the boiadeiro lifestyle, right?

links.title: Call Me Mañana: "He shrugs. "There are types of dang..."
links.text: He shrugs. "There are types of danger. The one I'm usually concerned with is lung cancer, or getting mauled by wildlife. Not... bullets."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""It calls back to an older era, whe..."
links.text: "It calls back to an older era, where this was commonplace, though. You have a true boiadeiro heart."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I got shot. No big deal.""
links.text: "Yeah, I got shot. No big deal."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Yet you live?" He nods approvingly..."
links.text: "Yet you live?" He nods approvingly. "It calls back to an older era, where this was commonplace. You have a true boiadeiro heart."

links.title: You: ""Right. So where is everyone?""
links.text: "Right. So where is everyone?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Hidin', gatherin' themselves. The..."
links.text: "Hidin', gatherin' themselves. The harbour's in full lockdown, friend. No getting in or out... for the time being."

links.title: You: ""You can't help me get inside?""
links.text: "You can't help me get inside?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""No, man. Not today. Today is war.""
links.text: "No, man. Not today. Today is war."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He says it matter-of-factly. Like i..."
links.text: He says it matter-of-factly. Like it's no big deal.

links.title: You: ""What's going to happen next?""
links.text: "What's going to happen next?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Time will tell..." He shrugs. "I'l..."
links.text: "Time will tell..." He shrugs. "I'll tell the bossman you dropped by. I'm sure he'll be glad."

links.title: You: ""It really hurts, Mañana. Pain -- t..."
links.text: "It really hurts, Mañana. Pain -- that's what your strike brought upon us."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: "He shrugs. "Any political movement..."
links.text: He shrugs. "Any political movement goes through a period of strife. Shame you got mixed up in it, though."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Yet it calls back to an older era,..."
links.text: "Yet it calls back to an older era, where this was commonplace. You have a true boiadeiro heart."

dialogueTree.title: Call Me Mañana: ""So..." He stares at you with his h..."
dialogueTree.text: "So..." He stares at you with his hazy eyes. "How'd you like our harbour?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "You've been in there, he means -- t..."
links.text: You've been in there, he means -- talked to the boss man too probably...

links.title: You: ""Was nice enough.""
links.text: "Was nice enough."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""It's but a rest area on the path l..."
links.text: "It's but a rest area on the path leading across open plains," he notes solemnly, then turns to you, a wide smile adorning his face:

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Right! You talked to the boss, eye..."
links.text: "Right! You talked to the boss, eye-to-eye -- like men of the plain. If you have any more questions, I'm set to talk."

links.title: You: ""Labour utopia." (Nod approvingly.)"
links.text: "Labour utopia." (Nod approvingly.)

links.title: You: ""Complete shit.""
links.text: "Complete shit."

dialogueTree.title: Call Me Mañana: ""Knocked him out good..." he greets..."
dialogueTree.text: "Knocked him out good..." he greets you. "Like the flying desperado!"

links.title: You: ""Who or what is a flying desperado?""
links.text: "Who or what is a flying desperado?"

links.title: Call Me Mañana: ""It's that really cool flying despe..."
links.text: "It's that really cool flying desperado spin kick you did, boiadeiro. Often performed by the most hard-bodied boiadeiros on the steppes."

links.title: You: ""It was nothing.""
links.text: "It was nothing."

links.title: Call Me Mañana: "He nods energetically. "So, what's..."
links.text: He nods energetically. "So, what's on your mind this time?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I sure did that thing.""
links.text: "Yeah, I sure did that thing."

dialogueTree.title: Call Me Mañana: ""I guess getting past the man ain't..."
dialogueTree.text: "I guess getting past the man ain't that simple after all…" He pauses to think. "So, what now?"
